Overview  Package  Class   Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES

Uses of Package
com.interface21.core

Packages that use com.interface21.core
com.interface21.aop.framework Package containing Spring's basic AOP infrastructure, compliant with the AOP Alliance interfaces. 
com.interface21.beans This package contains interfaces and classes for manipulating Java beans.  
com.interface21.beans.factory Package providing an alternative to the Singleton and Prototype design patterns, including a consistent approach to configuration management.  
com.interface21.beans.factory.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.beans.factory package.  
com.interface21.context This package builds on the beans package to add support for message sources and for the Observer design pattern, and the ability for application objects to obtain resources using a consistent API.  
com.interface21.core Some basic classes facilitating exception handling, internationalization, and the Visitor design pattern.  
com.interface21.dao Exception hierarchy enabling sophisticated error handling independent of the data access approach in use.  
com.interface21.jdbc.core The classes in this package make JDBC easier to use and reduce the likelihood of common errors.  
com.interface21.jdbc.core.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.jdbc.core package.  
com.interface21.jdbc.datasource Provides a utility class for easy DataSource access, and various simple DataSource implementations.  
com.interface21.orm.hibernate Package providing integration of Hibernate with Spring concepts.  
com.interface21.orm.jdo Package providing integration of JDO with Spring concepts.  
com.interface21.remoting Exception hierarchy for Spring's remoting infrastructure, independent of any specific remote method invocation system. 
com.interface21.transaction Exception hierarchy for Spring's transaction infrastructure, independent of any specific transaction management system.  
com.interface21.web.servlet.handler Provides standard HandlerMapping implementations, including abstract base classes for custom implementations. 
com.interface21.web.servlet.view.xslt Support classes for XSLT, providing a View implementation for XSLT stylesheets. 
 

Classes in com.interface21.core used by com.interface21.aop.framework
HasRootCause
          Interface to be implemented by exceptions that have a root cause.
NestedRuntimeException
          Handy class for wrapping runtime Exceptions with a root cause.
 

Classes in com.interface21.core used by com.interface21.beans
ErrorCoded
          Interface that can be implemented by exceptions etc that are error coded.

          Interface to be implemented by exceptions that have a root cause.
NestedRuntimeException
          Handy class for wrapping runtime Exceptions with a root cause.
ParameterizableErrorCoded
          Subinterface that can be implemented by exceptions etc. that are error-coded.
